overview.description: End-to-end development of a secure mobile banking application for a next-generation digital bank. Built native experiences for iOS and Android with real-time transaction processing, biometric authentication, and AI-powered financial insights serving 100,000+ users.

techStack.name: TypeScript
techStack.reason: Type safety for financial data handling

techStack.name: Redis
techStack.reason: Real-time data caching and session management

timeline.description: Analyzed banking regulations, security requirements, and user needs for digital banking.
Designed intuitive mobile interfaces with accessibility and security in mind.
Built cross-platform mobile apps, secure backend APIs, and integrated payment gateways.
Conducted penetration testing, obtained security certifications, and launched to app stores.

testimonial.quote: The Elites delivered a banking app that exceeds industry standards. The biometric security, real-time features, and beautiful UX have set us apart from traditional banks. Our user acquisition has exceeded projections by 40%.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen
testimonial.title: CTO, NeoBank Solutions
